Skarmory (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0226: Mantine
Pokémon
#0228: Houndour →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Skarmory (TCG Pocket).

Skarmory has been featured on 29 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Skarmory cards are normally Metal-type or Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Skarmory

Skarmory
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
